source_node.query: (Brent OR "Brent Crude" OR "Brent Crude Oil" OR "Brent Crude Oil Futures" OR "Brent Crude Oil Spot" OR "Brent Crude Oil Price" OR "Brent Crude Oil Futures Price" OR "Brent Crude Oil Spot Price" OR BNO OR "BZ=F" OR BZ) OR (oil OR "crude oil" OR "oil price" OR "oil market" OR "oil futures" OR "oil spot" OR "oil supply" OR "oil demand" OR "oil production" OR "oil consumption" OR "oil inventory" OR "oil stocks" OR "oil price forecast" OR "oil price outlook" OR "oil price trend" OR "oil price volatility" OR "oil price movement" OR "oil price change" OR "oil price shift" OR "oil price impact" OR "oil price risk" OR "oil price risk premium") OR (energy OR "oil & gas" OR "oil & gas sector") OR (OPEC OR "OPEC+" OR "OPEC+ production cuts" OR "OPEC+ supply cuts") OR ("US crude" OR "US oil inventory" OR "US oil stocks") OR (news OR analysis OR trend OR market OR report OR update OR breaking OR latest OR today OR forecast OR outlook OR volatility OR movement OR change OR shift OR impact)
source_node.name: Brent Crude Oil
